song.title: Fire Fall Down
song.lyrics:
[1] .E You bought my life with the . A Blood that You shed on the cross . When You died for the sins of men . B And you let out a cry . E Crucified now alive in me
[2] .E These hands are Yours . A Teach them to serve as You please . And I'll reach out desperate to see . B All the greatness of God . E May my soul rest assured in You
[P] .A B I'll never be the same .A B No I'll never be the same
[C] . E A Cause I know that You're alive . E A You came to fix my broken life . E A And I'll sing to glorify . C#m A Your Holy Name, Jesus Christ --- [3] .E You changed it all . You broke down the wall . A When I spoke and confessed . In You I am blessed . B Now I walk in the light . E In victorious sight of You
[T] .E Your fire fall down .A Your fire fall down .C#m A On us we pray . As we seek
[B] .E A Show me your heart . C#m Show me your way . A Show me your glory
